overview: Some boys question their sexuality – unsure as to whether they’re straight, gay or just somewhere in between. But not Ron Negba. In fact, this horny little fucker couldn’t be more into cock if he tried. From enjoying a bit of bathtime romance with his boyfriend, to him being literally used as a sex-toy by a big black hunk, this handsome beaut lives and breathes hardcore action morning, noon and night. And with a bevy of equally horned-up lads to help him explore his slutty side – Joel Tamir and Navon Raffi among them – this boy proves time and time again that he really is as gay as fuck!
title: Gay as Fuck
